variable.name: ID2
variable.description: DUMMY ID NUMBER (EYE DISEASE RESEARCH ONLY PARTICIPANTS HAVE A DIFFERENT DUMMY ID NUMBER)

variable.name: MATCHSPEC
variable.description: NUMBER OF MATCHED GENETIC SPECIMENS FOR THE PARTICIPANT (PARTICIPANTS WITH A GENETIC SPECIMEN)

variable.name: UNTESTSPEC
variable.description: NUMBER OF UNTESTED GENETIC SPECIMENS FOR THIS PARTICIPANT (PARTICIPANTS WITH A GENETIC SPECIMEN)

variable.name: TOTSPEC
variable.description: TOTAL NUMBER OF GENETIC SPECIMENS FOR THIS PARTICIPANT (PARTICIPANTS WITH A GENETIC SPECIMEN)

variable.name: DIABAGE
variable.description: AGE DOCTOR FIRST SAID HAD DIABETES AT BASELINE (PARTICIPANTS WITH A GENETIC SPECIMEN)

variable.name: DIABINS
variable.description: YEARS TAKING INSULIN FOR DIABETES AT BASELINE (PARTICIPANTS WITH A GENETIC SPECIMEN)
variable.value: More than or equal to 5 and less then 10 years
More than or equal to 10 and less than 20 years
More than or equal to 20 years

variable.name: DIABPILL
variable.description: YEARS TAKING PILLS FOR DIABETES AT BASELINE (PARTICIPANTS WITH A GENETIC SPECIMEN)
variable.value: More than or equal to 5 and less then 10 years
More than or equal to 10 and less than 20 years
More than or equal to 20 years

variable.name: DIABDIET
variable.description: YEARS CONTROLLING DIET FOR DIABETES AT BASELINE (PARTICIPANTS WITH A GENETIC SPECIMEN)
variable.value: More than or equal to 5 and less then 10 years
More than or equal to 10 and less than 20 years
More than or equal to 20 years
